name: Black Horizon
startIntroPart1: Hail our Glorious Leader, he who shall bring us to greatness!
startIntroPart2: Dear Leader, will you be able to build up a nation from humble beginnings that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Soon your walls shall crumble and we shall rule once more
attacked: Your will may be strong, but our fortifications are stronger
defeated: Impossible... our walls have failed us, and they shall fail you too due to your insolence
introduction: Greetings, are you here to admire our fortresses?
neutralHello: May our bond be as strong as our walls
tradeRequest: This deal may benefit us both greatly
uniques: Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged
[+2 Production] from every specialist [in all cities]
+[10]% Strength if within [2] tiles of a [Fort]
+[30]% Strength if within [2] tiles of a [Citadel]
No Maintenance costs for improvements in [Hill] tiles
